title: The Lily Bard Mysteries Omnibus
description: Lily Bard is starting over again. She’s disguised herself as much as she can, cutting her hair short and wearing baggy clothes, and she's moved to Shakespeare, Arkansas, where, working as a cleaning lady, she can sweep away the secrets of her dark, violent past. Before long, everyone is going to know Lily Bard’s name.
author: Charlaine Harris
